LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Hive_Forge_Worker.title: hive smith
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Hive_Forge_Worker.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] weaved back and forth through their hive city to reach the forge every day. In the forge [PAWN_nameDef] worked on reducing materials down to their base components for reforging.
